LanguageData.BetterLetters_PinQuestTooltip: Pin this quest's corresponding Letter to help keep track of it. If it is snoozed, the snooze will be canceled.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_UnPinQuestTooltip: Unpin this quest's corresponding letter. The letter will not be dismissed.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_SnoozeQuestTooltip:
Snooze this quest until later. If it is pinned it will be unpinned.
You will receive the "Quest available" letter again when the snooze ends. You will still receive notifications related to this quest, unlike dismissing it.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_PlaySettingsCreateReminder:
Create a new reminder.
Currently selected thing(s) can be automatically used as the reminder's "Jump To Location" target.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_AddBulkDismissBut: Add a button to bulk dismiss Letters

Adds a button below the stack of letters that can be used to dismiss many letters in bulk instead of right-clicking each letter one-by-one.
Has several options for what types of letters to dismiss, such as expired quests or snoozed letters.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_TimeUnitTooltip: Choose the unit of time to adjust.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_Section_LetterSta: Letter Stack (active letters on the right)
LanguageData.BetterLetters_OpenSettingsTooltip:
Open Better Letters mod settings to configure the appearance and placement of these buttons.
(Takes effect the NEXT time you open a letter)
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DisableRightClick: Disable right click float menu for pinned letters

By default, pinned letters replace the vanilla "Right click to delete" functionality with a context menu that has several options including dismissing. Enable this if you want right click to always unpin pinned letters instead.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_ModifyLetterText: Add information to Letter labels (new Letters only)
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_ModifyLetterText_: Whether or not to modify labels of letters to add more information at a glance. For example, whether a raid will attack immediately or wait a while.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_ReplaceLetterIcon:
Whether or not to replace the standard vanilla letter icon with new icons that reflect their status. For example, snoozed letters or new/expired quests. Only effects the Letter Stack, not anywhere else that Letters appear (like the History archive).
(Only applies to letters whose icons are changed dynamically, not ones changed by xml patches).

Whether or not to use custom replacer icons for various vanilla Letter types (such as new quests, deaths, etc.)
Changes to this setting will take effect the next time the game is restarted.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DismissedQuestsDi: Dismissing quests also dismisses the associated letter

If enabled, clicking the trash can icon on a quest to dismiss it will also automatically hide the "Quest available" letter for it. Note that the letter will stay pinned if you pinned it, but only in the archive.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_KeepQuestLettersO: In vanilla, when you click a "New Quest Available" letter, it instantly dismisses the letter and opens the associated quest in the main Quests tab. With this setting enabled, the letter will not be dismissed until you manually dismiss it or the quest itself.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DisableBounceIfPi: By default some letters (mostly negative ones in vanilla) have a little bounce animation to get your attention. If this option is enabled, pinned letters will sit still no matter what.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DisableBounceAlwa: By default some letters (mostly negative ones in vanilla) have a little bounce animation to get your attention. Enabling this option will turn that off for ALL letters.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DisableBounceNeve: All letters, pinned or otherwise, will bounce just like they normally do in vanilla.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DisableFlashIfPin: Letters in vanilla flash at you to get your attention. Turn this on to disable flashing for pinned letters so they aren't distracting.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DisableFlashAlway: Letters in vanilla flash at you to get your attention. Turn this on to disable that vanilla feature entirely.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DisableFlashNever: All letters, pinned or otherwise, will flash just like they normally do in vanilla.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_RaidAddDropPod: Add prefix to Drop Pod raids
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_RaidAddDropPod_De: Any raids with a "Drop" arrival mode have their letter name changed from "Raid" to "Drop Pod Raid" so you can assess the threat at a glance.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_RaidAddRaidStrate:
Add information about the raid type to the raid letter.
For example: Immediate/Delayed, Breaching, Sappers
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_RaidAddPawnCount_: Add "N attackers" to raid letter labels.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_RaidAddGroupCount: If a raid involves multiple groups attacking from multiple angles, add "N groups" to the letter label.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_MaxNumSnoozes_Des:
The maximum number of letters that are allowed to be snoozed at a time. Large numbers of snoozed letters could negatively impact performance slightly.
Also includes reminders.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_SnoozeTickPeriod_:
Number of game ticks between when snoozes check if they are complete. Larger values reduce performance impact but reduce accuracy for when they actually fire relative to the time that you set.
You probably don't need to change this unless you keep a LOT of active snoozes.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_MaxSnoozeDuration: Determines the longest allowed snooze in the "Snooze for..." dialog. Measured in days. Note that letters that are snoozed for a very long time may expire before the snooze finishes.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_MinSnoozeDuration: Limited by the Snooze tick period setting.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_SnoozeDurationRan: Duration limits for snoozes and reminders (ticks):
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_SnoozePinned_Desc: When a snoozed letter finishes its snooze timer, the letter will show up already pinned so you're less likely to miss it.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_LetterButtonsPosi: Pin/Snooze buttons will be added to the dialog when you open a letter. Use this setting to choose which part of the window they are placed in.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_LetterButtonTypes:
Dialog options adds a new option above the vanilla choices that is used for both pinning and snoozing. Icons adds an icon for pinning and an icon for snoozing to the corner of letter dialog windows.
You can enable both or neither if you do not want this feature.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_OffsetLetterLabel: Move Letter labels to prevent overlap
If enabled, the labels that are usually drawn on top of letters will be offset to the left so that they are instead drawn next to the letter icon, without overlapping it.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_LetterLabelsOffse: If the above setting is enabled, use this slider to fine-tune the exact x offset of the label to your liking.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_CurrentlySnoozed: Snoozed letters in the current game ({0}/{1}):
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_RecentSnoozesMax_: Maximum number of recently-used snooze durations to keep track of.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DurationSimilarit: Used to decide if a new snooze duration is different enough from already remembered durations.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_DoCreateReminderP: Add Create Reminder button to the bottom play controls
Adds a button to the bottom right buttons that can be used as a shortcut to create a new reminder.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_AutoSelectThingFo: Anything that you have selected when the reminder dialog is opened will be automatically chosen as the "Jump To" target for the reminder by default.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_AddQuestExpiratio: Add some special options to the dropdown when snoozing a quest to snooze until 1 day before expiration or until 1 hour before expiration.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_ChangeExpiredQues: If a "Quest available" letter for a non-dismissed quest is not dismissed itself (still on the stack on the right) when the quest expires, update the letter by: Changing "Quest available" to "Quest expired" Changing the type of letter to "NeutralLetter" (the grey type) Optionally, play a sound (see below).
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_QuestExpirationSo: When a "Quest available" letter is on the stack and the quest expires, this sound will play to notify you. Quests letters that you have dismissed will not play a sound.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_Patches_Note: For advanced users: Use this tab to enable or disable specific Harmony patches in this mod if something isn't working or if you simply know you don't want certain patches. WARNING: The mod may behave incorrectly if you disable patches. Use these settings with care.
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_ProbablyRequiresR: (Most likely requires game restart for changes to take effect)
LanguageData.BetterLetters_Settings_RefreshPatches_De:
Attempt(!) to patch/unpatch the selected patches without restarting.
Only recommended for troubleshooting! May cause errors!
